thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hunan Jiudian Pharmaceutical sees FY 2017 net profit up 24.7 pct to 37.6 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hunan Jiudian Pharmaceutical sees FY 2017 net profit up 24.7 pct to 37.6 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - hunan jiudian pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 26(Reuters) - Hunan Jiudian Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to increase by 24.7 percent to 37.6 percent, or to be 68 million yuan to 75 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 54.5 million yuan
* Says increased income from main business is the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/nuY65Y
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
